import React from 'react'; import { Download, ExternalLink, AlertCircle } from 'lucide-react'; const Dashboard = ({ scoreData }) => { ///GRAFICO SUS // Generate 20 points for each dataset with random but trending data const points = Array.from({ length: 20 }, (_, i) => `P${i + 1}`); const communicativeData = Array.from({ length: 20 }, (_, i) => Math.min(85, Math.max(30, 30 + i * 2.5 + Math.random() * 10)) ); const socialData = Array.from({ length: 20 }, (_, i) => Math.min(75, Math.max(20, 20 + i * 2 + Math.random() * 8)) ); // Cálculo del total const total = scoreData.reduce((acc, val) => acc + val, 0); // Cálculo acumulativo const cumulativeData = scoreData.reduce((acc, val, i) => { acc.push((acc[i - 1] || 0) + val); return acc; }, []); return (
{/* HEAD */}

{/* Main Grid */}
{/* CARD */}

Puntaje Q-CHAT 10

{total}/10

{i}
))}

); }; export default Dashboard;
